title-group.article-title: POSITIVE TRIGONOMETRIC QUADRATURE FORMULAS AND QUADRATURE ON THE UNIT CIRCLE

abstract.p: We give several descriptions of positive quadrature formulas which are exact for trigonometric-, respectively, Laurent polynomials of degree less or equal to n — 1 — m, 0 ≤ m ≤ n — 1. A complete and simple description is obtained with the help of orthogonal polynomials on the unit circle. In particular it is shown that the nodes polynomial can be generated by a simple recurrence relation. As a byproduct interlacing properties of zeros of para-orthogonal polynomials are obtained. Finally, asymptotics for the quadrature weights are presented.
